DOC.brief_summary: To assess influence different degree renal impairment safety , tolerability , pharmacodynamics pharmacokinetics 1.0 mg BIBT 986 BS give single dose infusion 30 minute comparison normal renal function
DOC.brief_title: Influence Different Degrees Renal Impairment Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacodynamics Pharmacokinetics BIBT 986 BS Subjects With Normal Renal Function Patients With Different Degrees Renal Impairment
